articles.title: Contact
articles.contents:
Qudus Uthman
PhD Candidate | Research - Water, Nutrients, and Pesticides
Management in Citrus; Soil, Water, and Ecosystem Sciences Department;
Institute of Food and Agricultural Services, University of Florida.
2181 McCarty Hall A
PO Box 110290,
Gainesville FL 32611.
E-mail: q.uthman@ufl.edu; uthmanqudus79@gmail.com

articles.title: Curriculum Vitae
articles.description: Qudus Uthman - Soil, Water, and Ecosystem Sciences Department, University of Florida.
articles.contents:
INTEREST
Water, Nutrients, and Pesticides Management;
Vadose zone hydrology;
Environmental Soil Physics and Ecohydrology;
Soil and Water Conservation and Management;
System Thinking Approach
Data Analysis
EDUCATION
2023 – PhD Soil, Water, and Ecosystems Sciences, University of
Florida, Gainesville, FL. |
Hydrologic Sciences Concentration | PhD Minor in Statistics |
Certificate in Biological Systems Modelling.
2019 – MSc Soil and Water Sciences, University of Florida,
Gainesville, FL.
2014 – B. Agric. (First Class, summa cum laude equivalent) | Soil
Science and Land Management, Federal University of Agriculture
Abeokuta,
Nigeria.
PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT AND TRAINING
2022 – DSSAT Model International Training Program May 16-21st
2021 – Two-day HYDRUS short course, March 16-17th
2018 – Teaching pedagogy and teaching with technology by teaching
center of the University of Florida Graduate School
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
2017 – Till date: Graduate assistant, Soil, Water, and Ecosystem
Sciences Department, Institute of Food and Agricultural Services,
University of Florida, Gainesville FL.
2016 – 2017: Federal Government of Nigeria Npower agricultural
services program at Ogun State Agricultural Development Program,
Abeokuta, Nigeria.
2015 – 2016: National Youth Service Corps at Ladoke Akintola
University of Technology Ogbomosho, Nigeria.
2012 – 2013: Intern at Odogbolu rural community settlement,
Community-Based Farming Scheme, Federal University of Agriculture,
Abeokuta, Nigeria.
2011 - 2012: Intern at Organic Agriculture for Tertiary Institution
in Nigeria, Federal University of Agriculture, Abeokuta, Nigeria.

articles.title: Water, Nutrients, and Pesticides Management
articles.description:
Graduate student | 
Soil, Water, and Ecosystem Sciences Department | 
University of Florida.
articles.contents:
Soil model as explained by Gerke et al. (2022) 
My research focus is on using the above soil conceptual model to
understand the fate and transport processes of water, nutrients, and
pesticides for best management practices.
